name: Central Processing, Unite!
description:
Controls:
A - Move left
D - Move right
E - Attach robot component
Space - Jump (Only if you have legs attached)
F - Operate levers (Only if you have arms attached)

R - Detach arms
T - Detach legs

Escape - Pause (Can restart from here)

factory tilemap: https://greebles.itch.io/freebie-factory

key icons: https://brastin3.itch.io/controller-icons

game font (ThaleahFat): https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah

city background: https://aangel.itch.io/city
